text: ' work, rest and leisure hours is shown in Table 5 and it is based on the Universal Declaration of Human Rights [57]. Basically, it is the standard deviation of a Gaus- sian distribution with average Î¼ = 0, representing the variability of the movement amplitude of A 1 in its free time or, in other words, how far the agent can walk from its actual position.
